sqlMap.select:
Select B.NO, A.GRPNAME, A.GRPCD, B.BASNAME, B.BASECD, B.REMARK, B.ISDELETE, B.BASEVAL From PGRPBASCD A Inner Join PBASCD B On A.GRPCD = B.GRPCD
Where A.GRPCD =#grpCd#
Select A.GRPCD,B.BASEKEY, B.BASECD, B.BASEVAL From PGRPBASCD A Inner Join PBASCD B On A.GRPCD = B.GRPCD Where A.ISDELETE ='N'
